C

ClientCommunicator - Class in pl.polsl.lab.client.communicator
Communicates with the server using a special protocol: all messages must begin with "start::" and end with "::end"
ClientCommunicator(Socket) - Constructor for class pl.polsl.lab.client.communicator.ClientCommunicator
Creates input and output streamsto be used to communicate with the server
ClientController - Class in pl.polsl.lab.client.controller
Establishes a connection with the server and manages the flow of data between the client and the server
ClientController() - Constructor for class pl.polsl.lab.client.controller.ClientController
Reads PORT and ADDRESS from properties file and creates the clientSocket.
ClientView - Class in pl.polsl.lab.client.view
writes and reads text from the clients console
ClientView() - Constructor for class pl.polsl.lab.client.view.ClientView
creates an instance of input stream.
close() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab.client.controller.ClientController
closes the clientSocket
